overview: The birth of a new baby is not what Igwe needs but the cry of a son. Twenty one daughters is more than enough for a King to look for a son to succeed him. To Igwe's surprise, he has a son living in a distant city. How did he get a son without knowing his whereabout all these years? Whom should he contact and where must he go? Who will go in search of this royal prince? [parts 1-2]
tagline: You can never tell if a mission would be accomplished on not...
title: Royal Messengers
